video_title: How I use Pinterest and Google to find $1M+ startup ideas

content_profile.title: How I use Pinterest and Google to find $1M+ startup ideas

key_takeaways: Solution: Systematic anti-trend analysis using Pinterest and Google Trends (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Trend-based content creation using Pinterest insights (Channel: content)
Strategy: Using Pinterest and Google Trends for systematic idea generation
Strategy: Anti-trend positioning - going opposite to mainstream trends
Startup Opportunity: AI-free SaaS or service positioning (Target: consumers who are turned off by AI integration)

startup_ideas.title: AI-free SaaS or service positioning
startup_ideas.target_market: consumers who are turned off by AI integration
startup_ideas.problem_solved: AI fatigue and preference for human-centered solutions
startup_ideas.validation: study showing AI lowers purchase intent
